item.title: End AZ-79 North at US-60
item.description: End AZ-79 North at US-60. Use US-60 East for Globe; US-60 West for Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching NM-55
item.description: US-60 West approaching NM-55 in Mountainair.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93, (To) AZ-89.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-101 Loop
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-101 Loop. Turn right for AZ-101 Loop north. Continue ahead for AZ-101 Loop south. The AZ-101 Loop shields are blue here, although new AZ-101 Loop signs are traditional black and white.

item.title: US-60 West - Thomas Road at 27th Ave.
item.description: US-60 west (Thomas Road) at 27th Ave. Turn right on 27th Ave. to continue on US-60 west.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201 Offramp at US-60
item.description: I-17 North - Exit 201 offramp at US-60. Turn left for US-60/To Grand Ave.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201
item.description: I-17 north at Exit 201 - US-60 West/Thomas Road/Grand Ave. US-60 west leaves I-17 north here.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at US-70
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south at US-70. Turn left for US-70 and to continue south on AZ-77. Turn right to continue west on US-60.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching US-70. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 west/AZ-77 south for Tucson (via AZ-77) and Safford (via US-70). This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 south approaching US-70. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73 east to Fort Apache, White River, and Fort Apache National Historic Park. Continue west on US-60 for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-73
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south approaching AZ-73.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South leaving Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn right to continue on AZ-260. Continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South.

item.title: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 west at AZ-260 west to Overgaard and Fool Hollow Lake Recreation Area. US-60 West/AZ-77 South continues to AZ-73 Jct. AZ-260 west leaves US-60/AZ-77 here.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Heber and Payson. Continue on US-60 West/AZ-77 South for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South in Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn left for AZ-260 west; continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Pinetop/Lakeside. AZ-260 joins US-60 West/AZ-77 South through Show Low. Use US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West for Payson and Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching AZ-260 in Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-77. Turn right for AZ-77 north. Continue straight for US-60 west and AZ-77 south. AZ-77 joins US-60 west to Globe.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77. Use AZ-77 north for Holbrook. Continue west on US-60 and AZ-77 south for Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering Show Low
item.description: Entering Show Low on US-60 west. Elevation 6,331, founded in 1870.

item.title: AZ-61 West at US-60
item.description: AZ-61 west at US-60. Turn left for US-60 east; continue ahead for US-60 west.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching US-60
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching US-60.

item.title: End US-60 West at I-10
item.description: End US-60 west at I-10 Exit 31 onramp.

item.title: End US-60 West at I-10
item.description: Western end of US-60 at I-10. The eastern end of US-60 is in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

item.title: End US-60 Approaching I-10
item.description: End US-60 approaching I-10. Use I-10 west for Los Angeles, and I-10 east for Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-72 West
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-72 west. AZ-72 runs northwest to Parker.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-72
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-72. Use AZ-72 east for Parker. Continue west on US-60 for Blythe (CA).

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-72
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-72. Approaching the community of Hope, AZ.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching Navajo St.
item.description: US-60 west approaching Navajo St. (to Salome Road). For I-10 east traffic turn left on Navajo St. For I-10 west traffic continue west on US-60.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering La Paz County
item.description: Entering La Paz County on US-60 west at the La Paz - Maricopa County Line.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-71
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-71

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-71. Use AZ-71 north for Prescott. Continue west on US-60 for Los Angeles.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-71.

item.title: US-60 West at Old US-93
item.description: US-60 west at former terminus of US-93, now signed as To US-93/To AZ-89. The main US-93/US-60 intersection was moved a half mile to the east and turned into a roundabout in 2009.

item.title: US-60 West at US-93
item.description: US-60 west at US-93 roundabout. This is the southern terminus of US-93.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93 at roundabout. This is a new alignment for US-60 and US-93, which moves a major intersection from the downtown area of Wickenburg

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93 To AZ-89
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93 North/To AZ-89

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93, (To) AZ-89.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-74/To I-17
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-74 East/To I-17. Use AZ-74 east to connect to I-17 at the north edge of the Phoenix Metro. area.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-74
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-74, To I-17. AZ-74 cuts across the north end of the Phoenix Metropolitan Area between US-60 on the west to I-17 on the east.

item.title: AZ-303 Loop North at US-60
item.description: AZ-303 Loop North offramp at US-60/Grand Ave. Use US-60 west for Wickenburg.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 143
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 143A - I-17 North/Flagstaff and Exit 143B - I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 143 AB
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143 A-B - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exits 143 A-C
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 143C - 19th Ave./Grand Ave. Also approaching Exit 143AB - I-17 North/Flagstaff/I-17 South

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 150
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150A - I-17 North/Flagstaff/US-60 West/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 west leaves I-10 west here.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. US-60 leaves I-10 west at I-17. Continue west on I-10 for Los Angeles and the Sky Harbor Airport.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A. Wickenburg bound traffic use US-60 west at Exit 150A.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 150B and 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/I-10 West Truck Route. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles. US-60 exits I-10 here and joins I-17 through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 150A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 150A - I-17 North/US-60 West/Flagstaff/To I-10 West Truck Route. Hazardous cargo must use I-17 north through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 151
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 151 - University Drive/32nd St.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 152
item.description: I-10/US-60 west at Exit 152 - 40th St. I-10 and US-60 continue west to Wickenburg (via US-60) and Los Angeles.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 178
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 178 - Alma School Road.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 179
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 179 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Chandler

item.title: Mesa Drive North at US-60
item.description: Mesa Drive north at US-60. Use US-60 west for Phoenix. Use US-60 east for Globe.

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 180 - Mesa Drive

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 181 - Stapley Drive

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 185 - Greenfield Road

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 186 - Higley Road.

item.description: US-60 west approaching Exit 188 - Power Road.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 190A
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 190A - AZ-202 Loop. This is the eastern extent of the AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: US-60 West - Exits 191 and 190A
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 191 - Ellsworth Road. Approaching Exit 190A - AZ-202 Loop.

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 192 - Crismon Road.

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 193 - Signal Butte Road.

item.description: Entering Maricopa County on US-60 west at the Maricopa-Pinal County Line.

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 198 - Goldfield Road.

item.description: US-60 west approaching Exit 199 - Old West Highway

item.description: US-60 west approaching Exit 212 - AZ-79 South/Florence/Tucson

item.title: Entering Superior
item.description: US-60 west - Entering Superior. Elevation 2,888. Founded in 1882.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-177 South
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-177 south to Winkelman and Kearny. AZ-177 is not displayed as a typical highway shield here, instead it is written out in text.

item.title: End US-70 West at US-60 and AZ-77
item.description: End US-70 west at US-60 and AZ-77. AZ-77 turns north here onto US-60 east.

item.title: End US-70
item.description: End US-70 approaching US-60/AZ-77 Jct.

item.title: US-70 West/AZ-77 North at US-60/AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at US-60/AZ-77 junction. Use US-60 East/AZ-77 North for Show Low and Springerville. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-60
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-60. AZ-77 north has been following US-70 west, and turns onto US-60 east. This is the western terminus of US-70.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 31
item.description: I-10 West at Exit 31 - US-60 East/Wickenburg/Prescott. This is the western terminus of US-60 west. The eastern terminus of US-60 is in Virginia Beach, VA.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South at Exit 11 - To US-60/Grand Ave./91st Ave.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South Approaching Exit 11
item.description: AZ-101 Loop South approaching Exit 11. Use Exit 11 for US-60/To US-93/Kingman/Las Vegas.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 153A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 153A - AZ-143 North/Sky Harbor Airport. Continue west for I-10/US-60 West/Phoenix/Wickenburg (via US-60).

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 153A and Exit 153B
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 153B - Broadway Road/52nd St. Approaching Exit 153A - AZ-143 North/Sky Harbor Airport. Overhead for I-10/US-60 West/Phoenix/Wickenburg (via US-60).

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 154
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 154 - US-60 East/Mesa-Globe. Sign for I-10/US-60 West/Phoenix. US-60 joins I-10 west through downtown Phoenix.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 155 and Exit 154
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 155 - Baseline Road. Approaching Exit 154 - US-60 East/Mesa-Globe. Sign for I-10/US-60 West/Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching Exit 177 and Exit 176AB
item.description: US-60 west approaching Exit 177 - Dobson Road. Approaching Exit 176B - AZ-101 Loop North and Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South.

item.title: AZ-87 South at US-60
item.description: AZ-87 South (Country Club Dr) at US-60 west to Phoenix and east to Globe. Continue south on AZ-87 to Chandler and Coolidge.

item.title: US-60 West at I-10
item.description: US-60 west at Exit I-10. Use I-10 east for Tucson. US-60 west joins I-10 west towards Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 West at Exit 172 Approaching I-10
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 172 - Priest Drive. Approaching I-10/Phoenix/Tucson. I-10 westbound HOV lane on left lane.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 176A and Exit 175
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South. Approaching Exit 175 - McClintock Drive.

item.description: US-60 West - Superstition Freeway

item.title: US-60 West approaching Exit 176AB and Exit 177
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 177 - Dobson Road. Approaching Exit 176B - AZ-101 Loop North and Exit 176A - AZ-101 Loop South.

item.description: US-60 east at AZ-74 east to I-17.

item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-74 east to I-17.

item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-74 east to I-17.

item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-74.

item.title: End US-93 South at US-60
item.description: End US-93 south at US-60. US-93 continues north from here to Eureka, MT and crosses into Canada at the Port of Roosville. US-93 becomes BC-93 and later AB-93 ending in Jasper, Alberta.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching US 60
item.description: US-93 south approaching US-60.

item.title: End AZ-71 South at US-60
item.description: End AZ-71 south at US-60. Use US-60 east for Wickenburg and Phoenix. Use US-60 west for Los Angeles.

item.title: US-60 East at AZ-71
item.description: US-60 east at AZ-71 north to Prescott. Continue on US-60 for Wickenburg and Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 East Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-71.

item.title: US-60 East at AZ-72
item.description: US-60 east at AZ-72 west.

item.title: US-60 East Approaching AZ-72
item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-72 west to Parker. Continue on US-60 east towards Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 East Approaching AZ-72
item.description: US-60 east approaching AZ-72 west.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 31
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 31 - US-60 East/Wickenburg/Prescott. This is the western terminus of US-60.
